overview: This award-winning, laugh-out-loud video teaches kids how to avoid dangerous situations with people they “don’t know” and those they “kinda know.” Full of important hot tips that are presented with humor, Stranger Safety will empower your child to make super-smart decisions. Perfect for elementary school-aged kids!
tagline: Hot tips to help keep cool kids safe with people they don’t know and kinda know
title: The Safe Side: Stranger Safety
